attributes.action: Rally the international community to assist with getting  the correct aerial support  with the  the Austrailian fire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Australia .AAP  September 20,2009,Australian residents should ready themselves for possibly the worst bushfire season the state has seen,
Hazard reduction burns continued across the greater Sydney area after more than 60 NSW bushfires 
"This is an essential part of being prepared for what could be the highest risk summer that we have ever faced," 
Thirty areas across NSW have declared their bushfire danger season prior to the official start of October 1.
"The recommendations there were simply if conditions are deemed to be catastrophic then the best option and the best advice to people is to leave and leave early."
NSW has joined other Australian states in introducing a new fire danger rating system ahead of the bushfire season, with a top level warning of "catastrophic".
NSW Rural Fire Commissioner "bushfire season preparation has soared in terms of dollars and efforts in recent times".
 
I want to see an approach for a collaberation as well balooning aid.
